name: Fourier Furious extended
description:
Highly interactive art piece which generates shapes of any complexity. The user can, with sufficient practice, draw practically any 2D shape imaginable.

Based on the mathematical theory on Fourier series.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fourier_series


Note: The work might react to key strokes only when you have clicked into the canvas at least once.

Note: Sound on! Click once into the canvas to start sound.


+-----------------------------------------------------+
| Take control                                        |
+-----------------------------------------------------+

  Toggle between DRAW and EDIT mode        [return key]

  Toggle PAUSE                              [space bar]

  Toggle RAINBOWS                                   [c]

  Change COLOR                            [mouse wheel]

  Change PEN SIZE                               [+] [-]

  DELETE drawing                          [right-click]


-------------------------------------------------------
The following things are possible in EDIT mode only:
-------------------------------------------------------

Place mouse cursor somewhere on the canvas,
but not on a segment. Then:

  ADD or REMOVE segments                  [mouse wheel]


Place mouse cursor over the center point of a segment,
then:

  Change RADIUS     [hold left mouse button] or [+] [-]

  Change SPEED                            [mouse wheel]


Place mouse cursor over the pen, then:

  Change COLOR                            [mouse wheel]

  MOVE somewhere else (constrained)    [click and drag]

  MOVE somewhere else    [shift key] + [click and drag]
